overview: The boy Ove loved his friend Siam Mehraf very much. After a while emptiness leads to their friendship. The boy Ove gets angry at his friend Siam Mehraf and he couldn't even say anything because of Ove's anger. And he goes away sad. But after a time, the story of the boy Siam Mehraf becomes something else. What is that story? Who's that story about? Who knows.
title: Kew Nei
